title: Mandai Boardwalk
blurb: Stunning views across Upper Seletar Reservoir.
description: Stretching 3.3km along the edges of River Wonders and Singapore Zoo, the Mandai Boardwalk offers stunning views across Upper Seletar Reservoir towards the Central Catchment Nature Reserve. Designed for all ages and abilities, the boardwalk is a haven for native wildlife, where you may chance upon birds, reptiles, butterflies, and more. Mandai Boardwalk is a freely accessible public space, perfect for families and nature enthusiasts. Enjoy a leisurely stroll and observe the local flora and fauna in their natural habitat. The boardwalk provides a unique opportunity to connect with nature and appreciate the biodiversity of Singapore. It's an ideal spot for a family outing, offering a blend of scenic beauty and wildlife observation.
keyword_tag: boardwalk, nature, wildlife, reservoir, family-friendly

title: Mandai Boardwalk: Kingfisher’s Cave & Tree Frog
blurb: Explore Mandai Boardwalk's two entrances and nature.
description: Discover the natural beauty of Mandai Boardwalk through its two distinct entrances: Kingfisher’s Cave, accessible via Mandai Wildlife East, and Tree Frog’s Hangout, conveniently located on the left side of the River Wonders entrance. These entrances offer unique starting points for exploring the boardwalk and its surrounding environment, providing visitors with different perspectives and experiences of the local flora and fauna. Enjoy a leisurely stroll and immerse yourself in the serene atmosphere of this natural haven, perfect for families and nature enthusiasts.
keyword_tag: nature walk, boardwalk, wildlife, outdoor, family

title: Mandai Boardwalk Self-Guided Digital Trail
blurb: Explore Mandai's biodiversity with a digital trail.
description: Embark on a self-guided digital trail along the Mandai Boardwalk and uncover the rich biodiversity and hidden stories of the area. Scan the QR code at either entrance to begin your exploration and complete the interactive activities. This family-friendly activity offers an engaging way to learn about the local flora and fauna while enjoying a scenic walk. Discover the natural wonders of Mandai and create lasting memories with your loved ones. Perfect for families and nature enthusiasts of all ages, this trail provides an educational and enjoyable experience.
keyword_tag: digital trail, biodiversity, nature, family, outdoor, Mandai

title: Mandai Boardwalk Digital Trail

title: Mandai Boardwalk: Wildlife and Nature Encounters
blurb: Explore rest stations and native wildlife haven.
description: The Mandai Boardwalk offers a unique opportunity to connect with nature and observe local wildlife. Visitors can enjoy sweeping reservoir views from “Eagle’s Perch”, spot dragonflies at “Damselfly’s Wing”, or unwind at “Lizard’s Lounge”. The boardwalk is designed to be a haven for native wildlife, offering close encounters with various species. “Iora’s Nest” provides a serene lookout for birdwatching and relaxation. It's a perfect spot for families to enjoy nature and photography, with chances to see changeable hawk-eagles, oriental whip snakes, and more. The boardwalk provides a family-friendly environment to appreciate Singapore's natural biodiversity.
keyword_tag: wildlife, nature, birdwatching, reservoir views, boardwalk

title: Mandai Boardwalk Rest Stations and Wildlife Haven
blurb: Unique rest stations inspired by local wildlife.
description: The Mandai Boardwalk offers unique rest stations inspired by local wildlife, including “Eagle’s Perch”, “Damselfly’s Wing”, and “Lizard’s Lounge”. It is designed as a haven for native wildlife, providing opportunities to encounter changeable hawk-eagles, crested goshawks, oriental whip snakes, Sunda colugos, white-bellied sea eagles, and Malayan water monitors. Perfect for birdwatching and photography, the boardwalk offers sweeping reservoir views and close encounters with nature. It's a family-friendly location where visitors can relax and observe Singapore's diverse wildlife in a natural setting. The boardwalk provides a serene escape for families and nature enthusiasts alike.

title: Iora’s Nest at Mandai Boardwalk
blurb: Serene lookout inspired by the nests of the iora.
description: Iora’s Nest is a serene lookout along the Mandai Boardwalk, inspired by the nests of the common iora. Overlooking the reservoir and thriving grasslands, it’s the perfect spot to birdwatch, unwind, and soak in nature. The Mandai Boardwalk also features unique rest stations inspired by local wildlife, including Eagle’s Perch, Damselfly’s Wing, and Lizard’s Lounge, offering families a chance to relax and enjoy the reservoir views. It is a family-friendly location where parents and children can enjoy nature.

title: Native Wildlife Haven at Mandai Boardwalk
blurb: Spot native wildlife at Mandai Boardwalk, Singapore.

blurb: Explore wildlife and nature at Mandai Boardwalk.

Observe the diverse wildlife, including the white-throated kingfisher, which builds nests in riverbanks, and the long-tailed macaque, an omnivorous monkey. Enjoy a peaceful walk surrounded by lush greenery and the sounds of nature. The boardwalk offers a unique opportunity to connect with Singapore's natural environment and learn about its fascinating inhabitants. Remember not to feed the macaques to maintain their natural foraging habits. title: Mandai Boardwalk Bird Watching Experience
blurb: Observe Crested Goshawks and other bird species.
description: The Mandai Boardwalk offers a unique opportunity to observe various bird species in their natural habitat. Keep an eye out for the Crested Goshawk, where females are larger than males, with browner heads and under-streaks. Their flight has a characteristic 'slow flap, slow flap, straight glide' pattern. This is a great activity for families and bird enthusiasts to enjoy the natural beauty of Singapore's wildlife. Explore the boardwalk and discover the diverse avian life that calls this area home. Perfect for a family outing, the boardwalk provides a serene environment to connect with nature and learn about local wildlife.
keyword_tag: Bird watching, nature walk, wildlife observation, family activity

title: Mandai Boardwalk: Wildlife Encounters in Singapore
blurb: Observe macaques and otters along Mandai Boardwalk.
description: The Mandai Boardwalk offers visitors a chance to encounter native wildlife such as macaques and smooth-coated otters in their natural habitat. This free-access area allows families to observe these animals from a safe distance while enjoying a leisurely stroll. Visitors are advised to maintain a respectful distance and avoid feeding the animals to ensure their safety and well-being. The boardwalk provides an educational opportunity for children and adults alike to learn about Singapore's biodiversity and the importance of wildlife conservation. It's a family-friendly activity that combines nature appreciation with responsible wildlife viewing practices. Remember to keep a safe distance from the animals.
